org.jclif.type
Interface OptionMetadata

All Superinterfaces:
InputMetadata
All Known Implementing Classes:
OptionMetadataImpl
public interface OptionMetadata
extends InputMetadata

OptionMetadata interface defines the common properties that describes a command line option.

Author:
Stephen Lou Banal <stephen.banal@gmail.com>

getDescription, getIdentifier, getLongDescription, isMultiValued, isRequired
 

Method Detail

getIdentifier

java.lang.String getIdentifier(OptionMetadata.IdentifierType type)
Returns the option key passed in command line depending on identifier format. Returned value can be either the long identifier value or the short identifier. For example, -f=file.txt versus --file=file.txt.

Returns:
String option identifier

getParameterMetadata

ParameterMetadata getParameterMetadata()
Returns the parameter metedata of an option.

Returns:
ParameterMetadata parameter metadata

isParameterAccepted

boolean isParameterAccepted()
Returns true if an option accepts an input parameter.

Returns:
true if parameter can be accepted, otherwise returns false
